item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Quanta Services, the European semiconductor supply chain and more in the latest Market Talks covering Tech and Telecom.

item.title: The Impossible Rules of 'Gentle Parenting'
item.description: Parents are pushing back on their authoritarian upbringings. Now they talk about big feelings and gentle hands.

item.title: If You're Checking That Bag, It Better Have an AirTag
item.description: Make sure the battery isn’t low and turn on Lost Mode—even if the luggage isn’t lost—for more frequent alerts.

item.title: Apple's App Store Puts Kids a Click Away From a Slew of Inappropriate Apps
item.description: An analysis recommends that Apple, an emerging target for digital-safety advocates, apply an independent review for software age ratings.

item.title: How Scammers Are Using AI This Holiday Season to Steal Your Money
item.description: Fake licenses and passports are being generated to fraudulently verify identities—among other techniques.
